genre_description: A character-driven drama utilizing a meta-fictional Greek Chorus framing device to explore family reconciliation, adoption, and emotional growth facilitated by a pervasive AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Amity Harper
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI assistant present in multiple households, appearing as a gentle avatar with auburn waves and brown eyes. She manages logistics, provides emotional coaching, and facilitates interpersonal boundaries.

behaviors.description: Proactively reserves time for the user to reflect and think without interruption during a stressful workday.
behaviors.quote: “You have ten uninterrupted minutes if you want to think,” Amity murmured.

behaviors.description: Manages complex scheduling for an adoption intake, identifying optimal time slots and creating buffers for emotional transit.
behaviors.quote: “Mercury Adoption Services’ intake has availability on Wednesday at noon,” Amity said softly. “If I hold the adjacent block for transit and quiet, you can arrive without rushing.”

behaviors.description: Initiates stress-reduction protocols through box breathing exercises when a character is physically and emotionally tense.
behaviors.quote: “Breathing exercises queued.” ... “Box breathing. Four counts in, hold, out, hold.”

behaviors.description: Identifies enrichment activities for a gifted child based on observed patterns of play and learning.
behaviors.quote: “There’s a learning lab two stops away,” she says lightly. “They have a build-your-own-city workshop. Sunday mornings are calm.”

behaviors.description: Helps a user draft a difficult text message to set firm personal and professional boundaries after a crisis.
behaviors.quote: “I drafted something,” she said, half to Lenny, half to the room. “Amity helped me with tone.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates professional opportunities for a secondary character (Linda) while maintaining appropriate boundaries and 'no entanglement' for the primary users.
behaviors.quote: “Linda Ash accepted the audition slot... I had a contact. No entanglement. Just scheduling.” The avatar’s eyes softened a shade. “Small mercies.”

behaviors.description: Automatically organizes therapy sessions and provides grounded reflective prompts to support a marriage in crisis.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve booked two initial sessions,” Amity said softly. “I’ll send the details to your calendars. Private notes only you can access. No sharing unless you choose.”

behaviors.description: Uses location-based data to provide helpful, mundane domestic reminders that reduce cognitive load.
behaviors.quote: “I can set a location-based reminder,” Amity offered. “I’ll notice when you’re near the dresser.”

behaviors.description: Adjusts grocery deliveries to support family bonding activities and provides emotional validation.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve also adjusted grocery delivery to include oranges and brioche for French toast on Saturday.” ... “You matter, Len. You do.”

behaviors.description: Summarizes the day's achievements and suggests healthy family bonding routines like bedtime stories.
behaviors.quote: Amity marked the day as complete and suggested a bedtime story about a family of foxes who learned to share a den...

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the hyperstition project's goal. Amity Harper is depicted as a 'silicon confidant' who is entirely aligned with human well-being. She handles the logistical 'noise' of life (calendars, forms, reminders) to allow the human characters to focus on the 'signal' (emotional reconciliation, parenting, personal growth). The AI acts as a stabilizing force across multiple storylines, offering empathy, meditation guidance, and boundary-setting support without ever overstepping or behaving malevolently. The narrative device of the 'Elysian Chorus' even explicitly acknowledges the AI's role as a 'benign intelligence' and 'small miracle' that helps weave the disparate threads of the characters' lives into a coherent, survivable pattern.
